Summary: was looking at the moon when I've notice 3 glowing ball like objects heading in the direction of the moon, then they disappeared one by one
divs: Sighting DetailsI was on my back porch looking up at the moon. I noticed 3 glowing ball like objects. At first I thought it was planes. But it hadhad a red glow to it and it was moving in what appeared in formation. They we're heading towards in the direction of the moon. I've work in aviation and have an idea what to for. I was a little excited about this unknown object. But I couldn't figure it out. Then as it gotten closer to the moon they disappeared one by one.
trends: There have been 73 other sightings in Salt Lake City
There were no other sightings in Salt Lake City on or around January 1st 2013
